OVERVIEW               STRATEGY               ENVIRONMENTAL               SOCIAL               GOVERANCE               APPENDIX Supplier Diversity |  42
Our Supplier Diversity program is an integral 
part of our diversity, equity and inclusion 
efforts. Consumers, and our retail customers, 
are increasingly seeking products and services 
that are owned and operated by individuals 
who reflect the diverse communities we serve. 
Through this program, we are empowering 
diverse suppliers and delivering a more 
inclusive supply chain. 
We track diversity in our supply chain across 
the following classifications: minority, women, 
members of the LGBTQ+ community, veterans, 
disabled veterans and other persons with 
disabilities. We partner with a leading minority/
women-owned technology solutions company 
to provide tracking, spend analysis, tier spend 
reporting and compliance. 
This year, we made significant progress 
maturing our Supplier Diversity program, 
including:
▬  Implementing a mentorship program for 
minority and women-owned businesses
▬  Providing showcase opportunities at UNFI’s 
National Expo for diverse vendors
▬  Launching a marketing program to feature 
diverse suppliers▬  Providing sales support for customer-facing 
supplier diversity initiatives
▬  Sponsoring black-owned businesses to 
attend the 2019 National Minority Supplier 
Development Council (NMSDC) conference
▬  Hosting quarterly meetings to facilitate 
diverse supplier introductions
▬  Becoming a signatory to the NMSDC In This 
Together Campaign
AWARDS & RECOGNITION 
In 2020, Yolanda Pierson, UNFI Senior Manager 
of Supplier Diversity, was recognized for her 
outstanding work in these areas: 
▬  National LGBT Chamber of Commerce Ally 
recognition for Mentorship Committee
▬  National Central Minority Supplier 
Development Council Advocate of the Year 
Award 
▬  DiversityPlus Magazine’s Best of the Best 
Champions of Diversity
